list.name: Changes
list.comment: [Modified - preproc.py.py] 1. Added a function to check for the presence of a negative value in a pandas dataframe

task.summary: Default task
First Commit
Added File - dataframe_wrangle.py with class Tabular to deal with basic data wrangling processes.
Added File - dataframe_wrangle.py with class Time_Series (to deal with Time Series data) subclassed from Tabular.
Added File: dataframe_basic_exploration.py Modified File: dataframe_wrangle.py - Modified the call function of the Time Series Class.

Added File: 1. dataframe_basic_exploration.py 2. config.ini 3. process_file.py
Modified File: 1. dataframe_wrangle.py - Modified the call function of the Time Series Class.
2. process_file.py -
a) Added the class "MoveDataFold" to deal with moving the data file(s) from the default download dir to the working directory.
b) Added a function to read configuration variables.

Added File: 1. dataframe_basic_exploration.py 2. config.ini
Modified File: 1. dataframe_wrangle.py - Modified the call function of the Time Series Class.
2. process_file.py -
a) Added the class "MoveDataFold" to deal with moving the data file(s) from the default download dir to the working directory.
b) Added a function to read configuration variables.
Added file: 1. dir_paths.py
Modified File: 1. process_file.py - a) Changed the criteria for filtering the files from "creation time" to "modified time".
Modified File: 1. process_file.py - a) Fixed timestamp to date conversion in the class.
Modified File: 1. process_file.py - a) Added a print option to the function unzip_data_fold.
Modified File: 1. dataframe_wrangle.py: a) Added the class "DealwithText" for NLP related tasks.
Files Modified: 1. dataframe_basic_exploration.py :- a) Added function multi_valued_rows b) Added function check_multi_record_preds c) Added assign_unqvalues
Files Added: 1. supplementary_functions.py 2. TS_forecasting.py

Files Modified: 1. dataframe_basic_exploration.py: a. Function determining the degree of imbalance.
b. Added the above in the call option of the Dealwithtext class
2. dataframe_wrangle.py:
a. Function to determine the median number of words per sample Dataframe.
b.

Files Modified: 1. dataframe_wrangle.py:
a. Added an argument to the function get_num_words_per_sample, asking for the name of the predictor containing the texts.
Minor Changes

[Files Deleted] dataframe_wrangle.py
[Files Modified] Refactored dataframe_basic_exploration.py
[Files Added] classification.py

[Modified] Fixed Library Import in dataframe_basic_exploration.py
[ISSUE] Kernel Dies everytime the Tabular class is instantiated
[Modified] Removed function for lowering the column names in dataframe_basic_exploration.py

[Modified] 1. Removed function for lowering the column names in dataframe_basic_exploration.py
2. For class Tabular, created parameters for Miss_Variables in dataframe_basic_exploration.py
3. Sorted the attribute reference issue in the method "assign_unqvalues" pf Tabular class.
4. Fixed the Error code - 3221225725 by removing the initialisation of "targ_name" in class Tabular.
[Modified] 1. Nomenclature changed.

[Modified] 1. Refactored dataframe_basic_exploration.py into basic_exploration.py.
[Deleted] 1. File has been deleted - dataframe_basic_exploration.py
[Addition] 1. File has been created - feature_engineering.py

[Modified] 1. feature_engineering.py renamed to preproc.py
2. Refactored preproc.py and basic_exploration.py
3. Added parameters and function for dtype based categorizing

[Modified] - preproc.py 1. Added a method to check for the presence of outliers in the "int" dtype parameters.
2. Added a parameter to contain the names of the variables containing the outliers.
3. Added an argument to "call" method

[Modified] - preproc.py 1. Added an argument to sort for the presence of missing valued variable
[Added] 1. feature_engineering.py - contains functions that can be used for feature engineering

[Modified] - config.ini 1. Added the "Templates" section for ipynb_templates paths.
[Added] - template_origins.py 1. This file creates the working directory and copies the relevant ipynb template into the directory.

[Modified] - template_origins.py 1. Refactored to make the code dynamic.
[Added] 1. Site_Names.json 2. Templates_Names.json

[Modified] - process_file.py 1. "\Z" has been dropped from all the ".findall()" searches.
2. Added a class that deals with creating dataframes.

[Modified] - preproc.py
1. Minor change to the print option in the "call" option.
[Modified] - config.ini
1. Added file path to the "timeSeries ipynb file"
[Modified] - basic_exploration.py
1. Added the parameter for Time Series in the "call" parameter

[Files Deleted] classification.py
[Name Changed] template_origins.py changed to main.py
[MODIFIED - main.py] 1. Adding to the call function of "MoveDataFold" class.
2. Added a function to MoveDataFold class, which moves out the contents of the un-zipped folder to the working directory.
[MODIFIED - process_file.py] 1. Added a function that checks the presence of zip folders in a given directory.

[Files Addition] create_dataframes.py
[Modified process_file.py] 1. Moved "CreateDataframe" class has been moved to create_dataframes.py

[ISSUE - create_dataframes.py - Solved]
1. Added re.IGNORECASE to re.findall flag.
[Modified - basic_exploration.py]
1. Added the 'keep' argument to duplicated row method.
[Modified - preproc.py]
1. Added the return statement to the dtype_categorization function.
2.Added the reset option in the "__init__" function.

[Modified - preproc.py]
1. Re-ordered the statement to remove the target variable from the integer list.

[Modified - preproc.py]
1. Removed the reset statement of dtype specific lists

[Modified - preproc.py]
1. Added the lower method to the name of the target variable before looking it up in the desired dtype list itself.

[Modified - preproc.py]
1. Added a function to return the list of predictors with outliers present - in the call function.

[Modified - feature_engineering.py]
1. Added a function which would return quarter number for given month.

[Modified - preproc.py] 1. Added default value to the "target_variable" argument.
2. A function that returns the indices of the rows with all NaN values among the missing variables.
[Modified - supplementary.py] 1. Added a function to export a dictionary to a JSON file.
[Modified - preproc.py.py] 1. Added a function to check for the presence of a negative value in a pandas dataframe
